body: @gunan the cuda 7.5 instructions pulls in the cuda 7.5 version of libcupti. On Cuda >= 8.0 it doesnt seem to come in its own library, rather it comes in extra with the cuda command line tools deb. So for cuda 8.0 you more or less need to add the library path to the appropriate location. Not sure, does that answer your question?
